languages.text: "Славно слышать столь чистый и праведный голос, сестра в бранном служении! Будем биться с нечистью плечом к плечу, сын Расса и дочерь Всеотца!"
"Glorious it is to hear such a pure and righteous voice, sister in war-making! Let us fight wickedness shoulder to shoulder, the son of Russ and the daughter of the Allfather!"
languages.original_text: "Славно слышать столь чистый и праведный голос, сестра в бранном служении! Будем биться с нечистью плечом к плечу, сын Расса и дочерь Всеотца!"

traits.locale_text: "Glorious it is to hear such a pure and righteous voice, sister in war-making! Let us fight wickedness shoulder to shoulder, the son of Russ and the daughter of the Allfather!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Glorious it is to hear such a pure and righteous voice, sister in war-making! Let us fight wickedness shoulder to shoulder, the son of Russ and the daughter of the Allfather!"

traits.locale_text: "Glorious it is to hear such a pure and righteous voice, sister in war-making! Let us fight wickedness shoulder to shoulder, the son of Russ and the daughter of the Allfather!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “能听到这样纯洁的正义之声，真是太好了，战斗姐妹！就让鲁斯之子和全父的女儿并肩对抗邪恶吧！”
languages.original_text: "Glorious it is to hear such a pure and righteous voice, sister in war-making! Let us fight wickedness shoulder to shoulder, the son of Russ and the daughter of the Allfather!"

traits.locale_text: “能听到这样纯洁的正义之声，真是太好了，战斗姐妹！就让鲁斯之子和全父的女儿并肩对抗邪恶吧！”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « La pureté et la ferveur de votre voix me mettent du baume au cœur, ma sœur guerrière ! Combattons le mal main dans la main, le fils de Russ et la fille du Père de Tous ! »
languages.original_text: "Glorious it is to hear such a pure and righteous voice, sister in war-making! Let us fight wickedness shoulder to shoulder, the son of Russ and the daughter of the Allfather!"

traits.locale_text: « La pureté et la ferveur de votre voix me mettent du baume au cœur, ma sœur guerrière ! Combattons le mal main dans la main, le fils de Russ et la fille du Père de Tous ! »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «¡Es glorioso escuchar una voz tan pura y justa, hermana guerrera! ¡Luchemos codo con codo contra el mal, como hijo de Russ e hija del Padre de todas las cosas!».
languages.original_text: "Glorious it is to hear such a pure and righteous voice, sister in war-making! Let us fight wickedness shoulder to shoulder, the son of Russ and the daughter of the Allfather!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Es glorioso escuchar una voz tan pura y justa, hermana guerrera! ¡Luchemos codo con codo contra el mal, como hijo de Russ e hija del Padre de todas las cosas!».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「光栄だな、そんな純粋で正義にあふれる声を聞くとは、戦場に赴くシスターよ！協力して邪悪と戦おうじゃないか、ラスの息子と全知の父の娘で共に！」
languages.original_text: "Glorious it is to hear such a pure and righteous voice, sister in war-making! Let us fight wickedness shoulder to shoulder, the son of Russ and the daughter of the Allfather!"

traits.locale_text: 「光栄だな、そんな純粋で正義にあふれる声を聞くとは、戦場に赴くシスターよ！協力して邪悪と戦おうじゃないか、ラスの息子と全知の父の娘で共に！」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Glorreich ist es, eine solch reine und rechtschaffene Stimme zu hören, Schwester in der Kriegsführung! Bekämpfen wir Schulter an Schulter das Böse, der Sohn des Russ und die Tochter des Allvaters!"
languages.original_text: "Glorious it is to hear such a pure and righteous voice, sister in war-making! Let us fight wickedness shoulder to shoulder, the son of Russ and the daughter of the Allfather!"

traits.locale_text: "Glorreich ist es, eine solch reine und rechtschaffene Stimme zu hören, Schwester in der Kriegsführung! Bekämpfen wir Schulter an Schulter das Böse, der Sohn des Russ und die Tochter des Allvaters!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "Glorious it is to hear such a pure and righteous voice, sister in war-making! Let us fight wickedness shoulder to shoulder, the son of Russ and the daughter of the Allfather!"

languages.text: "Ey savaşçı rahibe, böylesine saf ve faziletli bir sesi duymak ne büyük şandır! Russ'ın oğlu ile Yücebaba'nın kızı olarak günahkârlığa karşı omuz omuza savaşalım!"
languages.original_text: "Glorious it is to hear such a pure and righteous voice, sister in war-making! Let us fight wickedness shoulder to shoulder, the son of Russ and the daughter of the Allfather!"

traits.locale_text: "Böylesine saf ve faziletli bir sesi duymak ne büyük bir şandır savaşçı rahibe! Russ'ın oğlu ve Yücebaba'nın kızı olarak günahkârlıkla omuz omuza savaşalım!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
